text: @newtgingrich Pelosi deflecting from fact that while Coronavirus was beginning to be a problem here, Dems were hip deep in impeachment. They tied up WH resources and MSM news cycles while the virus problem grew. Pelosi called travel ban racist & encouraged gatherings in Chinatown mid February
